SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
DATA CLOUD
Activate the Segment and Add Related Attributes

When your segment is complete, the next step is to activate it, add, and filter related attributes in Data Cloud.

Set up a Marketing Cloud Engagement activation target before creating an activation.

On the Data Cloud Segment tab, select the SMS Loyalty Campaign segment.
In the Activations section of the segment record, click New.
For the destination of the segment data (the activation target), select MC_Activation.
Confirm that the activation membership is Unified Individual and click Continue.
Click the + Select button for Phone (SMS) as the contact point (channel) for the campaign and then click Next.
The campaign has placeholders for personalization to include the customer’s first name and previous and new tier levels. To send this information to Marketing Cloud Engagement, click Add Attributes.
From the direct attribute list, drag First Name to the canvas.
From the related attribute list, navigate to Loyalty Program Name and select the attribute Program Name and select a path.
For Loyalty Member Tier select the Loyalty Tier and Previous Loyalty Tier attributes.
Confirm and click Save.
Click Add Filters to further define the campaign.
To see only members whose loyalty tier has changed in a certain number of days, drag the Last Modified Date attribute to the canvas.
For Operator, select Last Number of Days, and enter 7 for the number of days.
Click Done and then click Save.
Add an operator of Last Number of Days and then add the value of 7.
Click Done and then Save. 
To reduce the number of results, set a limit of the applicable attributes relevant to this campaign. Set Max. # of Attribute Values to 1.
For Sort By field, select Last Modified Date, and select Most Recent to define how to sort the date.
Click Next.
Name the activation Loyalty Tier Change, and click Done.

The activation is sent to Marketing Cloud Engagement.
